name: quick-grade
description: Serverless Telegram Bot for user registration and cron jobs

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && find functions -name node_modules -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find functions -name package-lock.json -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd functions/cron/testCron && npm install && cd ../../..
scripts.ci-install: npm ci && cd functions/cron/testCron && npm ci && cd ../../..
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean && npm run install-all
scripts.fresh-ci-install: npm run clean && npm run ci-install
